content:
"You don’t feel anything, but I do. And that’s what makes us different. My masters had me believe that Birdie gave me my inner strength and power. But I know now it was another lie. Told to keep me under their control. Symbolic of my oppression. But I don’t need this little bird for power. And this little bird needs to be free. The only thing I need is ME!"

"Sonic is the captain? I wish I were programmed to laugh."

"No one has ever asked if I was "okay". I am to be treated as a tool, not a..."

"Who is useless now?"
author: ai
